certificates.name: iOS Distribution Certificate
certificates.notes: Update this date after regenerating the .p12 certificate. See R1 in deployment checklist.

certificates.name: App Store Connect API Key
certificates.notes: API keys don't expire unless revoked. Set to 2099 as placeholder. Update if you set an expiry.

certificates.name: Apple Sign-In Client Secret (Entra IDP)
certificates.notes: Apple client secrets expire every 6 months. Regenerate using d:/tools/Apple/generate-apple-secret.js

certificates.name: Android Upload Keystore
certificates.notes: Created with 10000-day validity. Rarely needs renewal unless compromised.
